short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes JavaScript powered fake "links" behave kinda like normal links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't you hate it when a site or web app has a link that looks like a link, responds like a link on hover, but once you click it, you realize it's not a link? 

When this happens, you can't open it in new tab even if you right click it. You can't even if you Ctrl+Click it, and scripting is to blame.

This extension allows you to force a "fake link" to behave somewhat like a real link.

Features:
- Ctrl + Click = Opens a fake link in a new tab.
- WIP: More features coming soon.
